definition[0]: the parents and other past family members of an animal or person, or an official written record of this
definition[1]: the history and achievements of something or someone, especially when they are good and should be admired
example[0]: Founded in 1781, the school has an excellent pedigree.
definition[2]: a pedigree animal comes from a family that has been recorded for a long time and is considered to be of a very good breed
